note:
Retired to France as I knew Brexit would be a disaster. Dancer, hobbyist DJ, cook, linguist, dressmaker, motorhome newbie.
Part of my heart is in Amsterdam, where I lived for ten happy years. I'm also a Manc, proud of my home city, but now trying out a change of pace in rural Normandie and regular trips around Europe. Photo is a view of Shambala festival from the lakeside, showing a helter skelter, big wheel, and several large tents, with a colourful hot air balloon hovering above the scene.
